long_description: The Granite Gear Taku 24 Pack lends itself well to a day in town or a weekend in the backcountry. Its trio of compartments keeps your gear neatly organized and easily accessible. Framesheet suspension, padded, removable belt and padded shoulder straps help ensure comfortable carrying. Hydration-compatible sleeve doubles as laptop sleeve (reservoir sold separately). Twin mesh side pockets for water bottles or wands; front mesh pocket; shoulder-strap pockets; hipbelt pockets. Built-in rainfly stows in compartment on bottom of the pack. The Granite Gear Taku 24 Pack features reflective tabs for nighttime visibility, dual ice-axe loops and a haul loop.
short_description: The Granite Gear Taku 24 Pack lends itself well to a day in town or a weekend in the backcountry. Its trio of compartments keeps your gear neatly organized and easily accessible.
